title: EP 109: Former Priority Exec Talks Jay-Z to Master P
itunes:title: EP 109: Former Priority Exec Talks Jay-Z to Master P
description:
Digging through our catalog of conversations, we ran across a convo Steele had with former Priority Records exec Ron Spaulding. They discuss Jay-Z's start at Priority, NWA, Master P's rise in the game and how he was upset they missed out on Cash Money.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
